Hi Anita, 

We have done all of the tasks, assigned to use, except the large images. They all need to be run through photoshop, so they are taking a little longer. 

FYI, for the"5 redirect chains and loops", we have left some of these in as they are for the PDS, AIG etc. This gives you the ability to use the /pds link and not have to update the PDFs as discussed. Please let the SEO agency know that we would like to leave this as is. 

I will update you once the images are optimised.

Just checking in to see how this is all going please?

Hi Anita, 

Here is the breakdown as discussed: 

Errors (Priority)

  1. Images too large - WP Perk to do
  2. 28 internal images are broken - WP Perk to do 
  3. 10 issues with mixed content - WP Perk to do 
  4. 5 redirect chains and loops - WP Perk to do 
  5. 3 pages returned 4XX status code  - WP Perk to do
  6. 3 internal links are broken - WP Perk to do
  7. 6 pages have duplicate meta descriptions - Content producer is looking into this
  8. 1 incorrect page found in sitemap.xml - WP Perk to do
WARNINGS (by Priority)
  1. 3,074 links on HTTPS pages leads to HTTP page  - WP Perk to do
  2. 8 external links are broken - Done
  3. 1 page doesn't have an h1 heading  - WP Perk to do
  4. Sitemap.xml not indicated in robots.txt  - WP Perk to do
  5. 86 pages don't have meta descriptions - Content producer is looking into this


    1. 3,274 URLs with a permanent redirect - WP Perk to do
    2. 16 pages have a low word count - I'm looking into this and coming back to you
    3. links to external pages or resources returned a 403 HTTP status code - Stella to supply
    4. 10 links have no anchor text  - WP Perk to do
    5. 12 orphaned pages in sitemaps  - WP Perk to do
    6. 10 links on this page have non-descriptive anchor text  - WP Perk to do

Great to chat through the list - see below for actions.

Thanks so much!

Anita Manchester

Hi Anita, 

Thanks for the info on the links, these two are now updated as well. 

Regarding the remaining items:

  • 6 pages have duplicate meta descriptions (we would need alternative meta descriptions)
  • 16 pages have a low word count (these may need more copy written. Sometimes though this is overkill if they are not SEO required pages, such as terms and conditions etc.)
  • 86 pages don't have meta descriptions (we would need you to provide these, or we can show you where to add them)
We will need the relevant content from you and then we can load them in. I hope that makes sense? Let me know if you need some pointers?

Logged 1.5H to Harvest
@rica 1.5hrs then OK to close while with wait for their feedback.  Thanks

Hi Anita, 

Hope you have been well, just checking in to see how the meta descriptions etc. are progressing? 

We have actioned all of the H1 errors, it was an extensive process. The external links are updated, minus two that we couldn't find the correct link for, these are attached. If you can let us know the new/correct links we will action that too. So far we have used 1.5hrs.

Hi Heath,

Thank you - I did. I had just gone back to Etienne to get his feedback on your plan of attack to see if he was happy with that… which he is.

I'm happy for you and the team to kick off working through the fixes that don't need our input - then for the rest I'll see if I can get the team to start working on meta descriptions etc to drop into the pages.

Please let me know if you need anything from me to get started?

Thanks

Anita

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Anita, 

Just bumping this email to make sure you received it?

Hi Anita, 

Thanks for sending this through. 

We can certainly help to fix these up for you. The only items that we would need your help with are:

  • 6 pages have duplicate meta descriptions (we would need alternative meta descriptions)
  • 8 external links are broken (we may need the working links if we can't find them)
  • 16 pages have a low word count (these may need more copy written. Sometimes though this is overkill if they are not SEO required pages, such as terms and conditions etc.)
  • 86 pages don't have meta descriptions (we would need you to provide these, or we can show you where to add them)
  • 122 pages have more than one H1 tag (we should be able to sort his one out, it might just be a coding related issue)
Here's what I recommend:

  1. We tackle the items that are within our control (i.e. not the above ones)
  2. We then point you in the right direction for the above items
We can use your monthly allowance (2 hours to complete these, but I think we will need some time on top as well. I would budget an extra 3-5hrs, so 5-7hrs in total). Let me know if we are ok to proceed and we will just bill for the extra hours at the end of the month.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hello team,

We recently had an SEO audit done on our site and they have come back with recommendations on fixes for the site.
Are you able to review the proposed technical / site fixes and confirm:

  1. Whether you are able to assist with these fixes
  2. Time / estimate of time it would take to fix - and what the costs would be outside of our normal agreement
  3. If there are any items they have flagged that you would not recommend fixing

I'm not sure if this is a separate project we need to engage you for or not so please let me know wither way.

Thanks,
Anita


Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

Level 15, 50 Pitt St, Sydney NSW 2000

m 0404 968 482

e anita@stellainsurance.com.au

w stellainsurance.com.au
